long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aims to streamline the content creation process for YouTube and Vimeo videos. It assists creators by generating titles, summaries, chapters, and other relevant information for their videos.

By analyzing the content of the video, it automatically suggests potential titles that are catchy and descriptive. 

Additionally, it creates concise summaries that encapsulate the main points covered in the video, making it easier for viewers to grasp the key concepts. Moreover, the extension helps in structuring the video by generating chapter markers based on the different sections of the content.

Overall, this tool is designed to save time for creators and enhance the quality and organization of their video content.
